import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;

//작성자 : 유형민
//제목 : 퇴사
//번호 : 14501번
//수정일 : 2018. 9. 7
//언어 : Java

public class Main {
	static int N;
	static ArrayList<Pair> work;
	static int tm;
	static int MAX;

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());

		N = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
		work = new ArrayList<>();

		for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
			st = new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());
			int day = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
			int money = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());

			work.add(new Pair(day, money));
		}

		for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
			// 상담 기간이 N보다 클경우
			if (i + work.get(i).day > N)
				continue;

			dfs(i + work.get(i).day, work.get(i).money);
		}

		System.out.println(MAX);
	}

	private static void dfs(int index, int totalMoney) {
		//최댓값
		if (MAX < totalMoney)
			MAX = totalMoney;

		for (int i = index; i < N; i++) {
			int tempIdx = i + work.get(i).day;
			int tempMoney = totalMoney + work.get(i).money;

			//범위가 넘을 경우
			if (tempIdx > N)
				continue;

			dfs(tempIdx, tempMoney);
		}
	}
}

class Pair {
	int day;
	int money;

	public Pair(int day, int money) {
		this.day = day;
		this.money = money;
	}
}
